title: Another Lee Sin buff..?
body: Nice to see Riot doing its usual sneaky thing and buffing Lee Sin again, he had a minor buff a few weeks back and I do not think anyone would agree that he needs another since he has always been a viable jungler. But the sneaky way that Riot goes about this, hoping people won't notice if they buff "Riot's Golden Boy". I am really tired of Riot's favouritism towards some champions in this game and their unfair treatment of other less popular champions.

replies.body: THe problem with Lee Sin is that he can freely invade your jungle and take your buffs early game since you can't duel him - he'll just oneshot you. Buffing Lee without nerfing his early game is pretty stupid imo.

I agree, its utterly disgusting that {{champion:103}} gets better numbers then most static mages in the game AND more mobility. {{champion:157}} will  probably get gutted soon enough because players are effectively cheating with him at the moment and building him as a tank, which is NOT what he is supposed to be used for and proof that Blizzard totally do not know how to program or develop their own game. 

{{champion:157}} is a horrible design... he always will be... like {{champion:92}}, why? Because there is NOTHING that gates their low cooldown, spammable abilities so he does not have to worry about lack of resources in a fight. Give them both mana and ta-dah... he's fixed and cannot dash around like a hyperactive hamster.
He 100% needs it and I doubt it's enough.
